mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_NICKNAME, U.USER_AFFILIATION_DETAIL, U.USER_PROFILE_IMG, S.RANK_NUM, COUNT(GR.GAME_RECORD) AS matches, SUM(CASE WHEN GR.GAME_RECORD IN (1, 2, 3, 4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wins, SUM(CASE WHEN GR.GAME_RECORD = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS losses, ROUND((SUM(CASE WHEN GR.GAME_RECORD IN (1, 2, 3, 4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(GR.GAME_RECORD)) * 100, 1) AS RECORD_PERCENTAGE FROM TB_USER U JOIN TB_SEASON S ON U.USER_NUM = S.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN TB_GAME_RECORD GR ON U.USER_NUM = GR.USER_NUM WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId} AND S.SEASON_NAME = '2023-2' GROUP BY U.USER_NICKNAME, U.USER_AFFILIATION_DETAIL, U.USER_PROFILE_IMG, S.RANK_NUM;
